scripts.install-node: rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm run install
scripts.install-electron: rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=electron npm run install
scripts.install-web: rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=web npm run install
scripts.install-webdav: rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=webdav npm run install
scripts.install-cordova: rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=cordova npm run install
